short_summary: RFP for architectural consulting services to review a decade old needs study and determine the best course of action for today and beyond for the Charlottetown Research and Development Center (CRDC).
description: Using this request for proposal (RFP), Public Services and Procurement Canada (PSPC) on behalf of the Agriculture and Agri-Foods Canada (AAFC) is requesting bids for a contract to provide architectural consulting services to review a decade old needs study and determine the best course of action for today and beyond for the Charlottetown Research and Development Center (CRDC).
full_summary:
**Tender Announcement**

*   **Title:**             ED001-241003-B - Service en consultant actuari
           Paris

*   **Title French:**             ED001-241003-B - Études des besoins du CCRD, Charlottetown (Î.-P.-É.)
*   **Reference Number:** WS4268970143-Doc4328542759
*   **Amendment Number:**        1
*   **Solicitation Number:**     WS4268970143
*   **Publication Date:**        2023-11-28
*   **Tender Closing Date and Time:** 2023-12-22 14:00:00
*   **Amendment Date:**         2023-12-15
*   **Expected Contract Start Date:**   2023-11-23
*   **Expected Contract End Date:**      2025-03-31
*   **Tender Status:**             Expired
*   **Procurement Category:**    CNST
*   **Notice Type:**             Request for proposal.
*   **Procurement Method:**      Competitive – Selective tendering.
*   **Trade Agreements:**   Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP), the Canada – United States – Mexico Agreement (CUSMA), the Canada Chile Free Trade Agreement, the Comprehensive Free Trade Agreement and the World Trade Organization Government Procurement Agreement (WTO GPA).  
*   **Contracting Entity:**   Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC), located at 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5, Canada.
*   **Contact Person:**         Grant, Stewart (SPAC/PSPC)
*   **Email:**    stewart.grant@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
*   **Procurement Description:** Public Services and Procurement Canada (PSPC) requires architectural consulting services to review a decade old needs study and determine the best course of action for today and beyond for the Charlottetown Research and Development Center (CRDC).
*   **Trade Agreements Affected:** Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP), the Canada – United States – Mexico Agreement (CUSMA), the Canada Chile Free Trade Agreement, the Comprehensive Free Trade Agreement and the World Trade Organization Government Procurement Agreement (WTO GPA).
